style1.name: Geometric High-Contrast Logo Style

notes.refinements: Anchor-to-anchor lines must maintain logical angle progression and avoid abrupt or jagged joins.
notes.styleContinuity: Maintain geometric precision while allowing for slight expressive exaggeration (horns, eyes, claws, etc.)

style1.description: A bold, stylized identity system based on angular geometric forms with clean vector edges and high visual contrast. Logos depict animals, creatures, or symbolic figures in white on a black background using refined anchor transitions for smoother lines.

fileGuidelines.vectorCleanliness: No overlapping paths, optimized points, and consistent anchor spacing

designDirectives.sizing: Fits within a square or circular composition; edge-to-edge minimal margin
designDirectives.balance: Maintain visual balance between weight and negative space
designDirectives.geometry: Use straight edges and triangular/diamond forms as the foundation
designDirectives.symmetry: Used for mask-style or owl-like icons; asymmetry allowed in dynamic animals
designDirectives.anchorSmoothing: Minimize harsh transitions by adjusting Bezier handles while retaining straight edges

brandingApplication.usage: Apparel, digital branding, merchandise, social identity
brandingApplication.trademark: Optional monogram or symbol may be included subtly
brandingApplication.exclusivity: Each figure should feel unique but clearly part of the same visual language

visualCharacteristics.edgeStyle: Angular with softened directional flow; no curves, but paths transition cleanly between points
visualCharacteristics.lineQuality: Smooth vector transitions between anchor points, no jagged or pixelated edges

style2.name: Minimalist 3D Illustration
style2.description: To create clean, aesthetically pleasing visuals that emphasize simplicity, approachability, and modernity.

visual_elements.shape_language: Rounded edges, smooth and soft forms with simplified geometry

colors.shading: Soft gradients with smooth transitions, avoiding harsh shadows or highlights

lighting.source_direction: Above and slightly to the right
lighting.shadow_style: Subtle and diffused, no sharp or high-contrast shadows

materials.surface_texture: Matte, smooth surfaces with subtle shading

composition.object_presentation: Single, central object displayed in isolation with ample negative space
composition.perspective: Slightly angled, giving a three-dimensional feel without extreme depth
composition.background: Solid, muted color that complements the object without distraction

typography.text_placement: Bottom-left corner with small, subtle text

rendering_style.detail_level: Medium detail, focusing on form and color over texture or intricacy

styles.cssRules: body { background-color: #F4F1EE; font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif; color: #444; } .title { font-size: 2em; font-weight: 300; }
styles.layout: Centered object with generous negative space; full responsiveness for all screen sizes

style3.name: Isometric Vector Illustration
style3.description: A modern, three-dimensional isometric vector illustration style characterized by a clean, minimalistic design with a focus on geometric shapes and a predominantly monochromatic blue color palette. This style uses a consistent 30-degree angle projection to create depth and perspective while maintaining a flat, scalable aesthetic suitable for various applications.

line_style.edge_definition: Clean, smooth, and continuous with no texture or variation in thickness. Single outline per shape with occasional inner lines for detailing.

shading_and_lighting.highlight_method: Implied through lighter areas or absence of shading

elements_and_theme.style_of_objects: Stylized and geometric with an isometric 3D effect, focusing on overall form rather than details
elements_and_theme.character_design: Simplified figures with minimal details, used sparingly
elements_and_theme.subject: Blends historical, natural, or urban elements with modern or technological twists
elements_and_theme.mood: Calm, adventurous, and playful yet serene

environment_details.background_elements: Solid white or light color, occasionally with subtle additions like clouds or water ripples
environment_details.texture: None, with smooth and flat surfaces

visual_tone_and_feel.mood: Calm, adventurous, and playful yet serene

recommendations: Zoom and pan transitions to explore the scene
Subtle animations of elements like floating balloons or moving vehicles
